job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-25T03:41:11.000Z", "description": "Fortanix is a dynamic start-up solving some of the world\u2019s most demanding data protection challenges for companies and governments around the world. Our disruptive technology maintains data privacy across its entire lifecycle -- at rest, in motion, and in use across any enterprise IT infrastructure -- public cloud, on-premise, hybrid cloud, and SaaS. With key strategic partners like Intel and Equinix, Fortanix customers like PayPal, Google & Addidas are reaping the benefits. Recognized by Gartner as a \u201cCool Vendor\u201d, Fortanix is revolutionizing cyber security.

Join the revolution!

You will
  • Contribute to a friendly and helpful company culture
  • Design, implement, test, and maintain one or more of
    • The backend of our cloud security platform, written in Rust, C
    • Our Runtime Encryption\u00ae software for SGX, written in Rust and C
  • Help deploy, monitor, and tune the performance of our software
  • Participate in peer code review, which we believe results in a higher-quality product
  • Follow security best practices (don\u2019t worry, we\u2019ll tell you what they are)
Requirements

You are someone who
  • Exhibits uncompromising integrity
  • Pays attention to detail
  • Thinks critically about complex technical problems
  • Can work independently, while also being an effective member of a team
You have
  • 2 to 5 years experience.
  • Experience in Rust, C/C++, Java, Python, or G.
  • Coursework and/or professional experience in computer architecture and operating systems
  • A bachelor\u2019s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field, or equivalent training or work experience
  • Security experience is a plus, but is not required
Benefits

Benefits
  • Free catered lunch every day
  • Unlimited PTO (it\u2019s between you and your work)
  • Friendly culture that brings the best out of everybody
  • Great working environment, we believe this in its truest form, \"Never Doubt that a small group of thoughtful committed technologists can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has\" - Margaret Mead
